annonsrubrik: Internal IT Technician to Dynamic Code
annonstext:
Dynamic Code is a HealthTech company that is about to revolutionize healthcare. As the company grows so fast, there is now a great need for increased internal IT support. Therefore, we are now looking for a proficient and skilled internal IT technician who wants to contribute to this journey and meet the company's increased needs.

About the company
Dynamic Code’s vision is to help people take control of their own health and develops meaningful health and diagnostic tests based on DNA technology. The tests are offered in a digital communication and logistics platform that is revolutionizing medical sampling and diagnostic tests. Tests that previously required sampling at clinics and by healthcare professionals and sometimes took months and years, patients can now do themselves and receive answers and treatment within a few days. Without compromising on quality - Dynamic Codes tests meet all medical and regulatory requirements.

Job description
In the role of internal IT technician at Dynamic Code, you will be responsible for ensuring that the internal IT environment works and meets the requirements of the business, today and in the future. Your responsibilities will include:

- Computers (PC & Mac)
- Servers/cloud solutions
- Software Asset Management
- Contracts

Furthermore, you will be the contact person for the company's IT suppliers.

Your profile
To fit into the role, we believe that you have a broad competence in internal IT as well as a solid interest in IT and technology that you use to create value for the business with a structured approach. We believe that you either have relevant training with a focus on IT or you have experience of working in an internal IT function with technical expertise around networks, computers, and users.

You are an open and service-minded person who understands the importance of first-class IT service and who is passionate about constantly developing, improving and creating the best possible experiences for the employees.

Application process
Dynamic Code collaborates with Skill in this recruitment process. Please note that we work with ongoing selection and that the position may be filled before the last application date, therefore we encourage you to apply for the position today. Log in or register your CV at www.skill.se.

For questions regarding the position, please contact responsible recruiter FIRSTNAME LASTNAME  TELEPHONENO ,  EMAIL  or FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO ,  EMAIL .
